Heading: Number of victims
Value: 22 in New Jersey; 7 in Pennsylvania; Claims to have killed as many as 40 people but can’t remember their names

Heading: Raised by
Value: Mother until age 17; Shortly after her death Charles enlisted in the Navy

Heading: Parent’s marital status
Value: Deceased; Charles’s mother became a widow when he was 7

Heading: Teased while in school?
Value: Yes; Teased and hazed viciously in the Navy-Given the nickname 'Fish-belly' by fellow officers due to his sallow and pale complexion

Heading: Highest degree
Value: Registered Nursing Degree from Mountainside School of Nursing

Heading: Grades in school
Value: Excelled in nursing school-A’s & B’s; Scored extremely high on National Council Licensure Examination for Registered Nurses (2437)

Heading: Type of discharge
Value: Discharged March 30, 1984-Naval authorities have not publicly released whether the discharge was issued for medical reasons or other reasons

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Marital status
Value: Married at the time of the 1st murder in 1988; Divorced since 1993

Heading: Lives with his children
Value: Lived with children at the time of 1st murder but not at the time of subsequent murders

Heading: Living with
Value: Spouse 1987-1993; pregnant girlfriend at the time of his arrest in 2003

Heading: Diagnosis
Value: Major Depression; Alcohol Dependence; Acute Anxiety Wife described him as a 'borderline personality' but this diagnosis has not been confirmed

Heading: Number of victims
Value: Charged with 29-claims to have killed close to 40 but can’t remember names

Heading: Killer age at start of series
Method of killing
Value: Gave patients overdoses of primarily digoxin, a heart medication but also used lidocaine, norepinephrine, dobutamine, and sodium nitroprusside

Heading: How close did killer live?
Value: Drove to scene of crime; occurred at his place of employment

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?
Left at scene, no attempt to hide
Sentence
Value: 11 consecutive life terms meaning that he won’t be eligible for parole until he serves 397 years behind bars

Heading: Name and state of prison
Value: Has not been transferred to a prison yet-is currently being held at the Somerset County Jail in Somerset, New Jersey
